info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-member-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for operational data of all Stack members.
     Copyright (c) 2019-2020, 2022-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Platform & Hardware
**Paths:** 9

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-member-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-member-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-member-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-stack-member-oper.html)

get.description: A list of data provider locations (collection)
A list of data provider locations
A list of data provider locations (collection)
A list of data provider locations

rac-inserted.description: Outgoing byte count on stack port

rac-copied.description: Incoming byte count on stack port

rac-invalid-ringword-err.description: Stack interface invalid ring word error

rac-rwcrc-err.description: Stack interface ring word CRC error

link-ok.description: Functional stack cable connected to stack port

link-actv.description: Functional neighbor connected at the other end of the stack cable, making the link active

sync-ok.description: The link partner sends valid protocol messages to the stack port

in-loop-bk.description: No stack cables attached on the member ports

rac-inserted.description: Outgoing byte count on stack port

rac-copied.description: Incoming byte count on stack port

rac-invalid-ringword-err.description: Stack interface invalid ring word error

rac-rwcrc-err.description: Stack interface ring word CRC error

watermark-50-cnt.description: Number of times keepalives missed for 50% of timeout value

watermark-75-cnt.description: Number of times keepalives missed for 75% of timeout value

tx-seq-no.description: DAD Port next TX seq num

latency.description: Round trip delay to reach peer stack node

pagp-dad-enbl.description: Dual-active detection using Port Aggregation Protocol(PAgP)

svl-bw.description: Total bandwidth of the available stackwise virtual links in a stackwise virtual system
